name: sfpwowerscript-checkoutprojectfromartifact-task
friendlyName: Checkout the project from Git mentioned in the artifact
description: Use this utility task to checkout the mentioned commit from the build artifact, This task is part of DX@Scale/SFPowerscripts
author: azlam.abdulsalam

inputs.name: artifactname
inputs.label: Alias or username of the target org
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the artifact that is generated from the build pipeline  for a source format deployment

inputs.name: username
inputs.label: Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Username for the Version Control Provider

inputs.name: password
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: App Password/PAT for the Version Control Provider
